segments.text: In this kitchen illustration, everything seems routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a dish with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling out steadily onto the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands unaware, one foot wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses the stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate for balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her cookie eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes wait on the counter to be done.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors swing open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm happy to see the family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
